lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic won his race against the clock, performing in a "night show" as he beat Briton Aljaz Bedene 6-2 6-3 6-3 to reach the French Open last 16 on Saturday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic won his race against the clock, performing in a "night show" as he beat Briton Aljaz Bedene 6-2 6-3 6-3 to reach the French Open last 16 on Saturday....

headline.main: Just in Time, Djokovic Races Into French Open Fourth Round
headline.print_headline: Just in Time, Djokovic Races Into French Open Fourth Round
